text: Gebhard Leberecht von Blücher, Fürst von Wahlstatt (; December 16, 1742 – September 12, 1819) was a Prussian general who went to war against Napoleon. A bust in the German Walhalla temple near Regensburg was sculpted in his honour. For his military service, a statue was built in his name in Breslau (now Warsaw). ==References== == Other websites == *von Blucher at thefreedictionary.com Category:1742 births Category:1819 deaths Category:German generals Category:People from Rostock
title: Gebhard Leberecht von Blucher
